- "L 53.07,18.45": This creates a line segment from (36.78, 22.62) to (53.07, 18.45).
- "L 55.94,34.61": This creates a line segment from (53.07, 18.45) to (55.94, 34.61).
- "L 49.56,30.61": This creates a line segment from (55.94, 34.61) back to the starting point (49.56, 30.61), closing the path.

From the coordinates, we can see that the path forms a shape with 8 sides, alternating between two different angles (roughly 135 degrees and 45 degrees). This matches the definition of a heptagon, which is a polygon with 7 sides and 7 angles.

Thus, the correct answer is:

(B) heptagon
